aboutpara:
I am an IT professional specializing in network administration, cloud computing, and system deployment. Currently, I oversee the management of virtual servers (Proxmox), troubleshoot network and system issues, and implement advanced IT solutions for both internal operations and corporate clients.
My role involves designing and deploying scalable IT infrastructures, ensuring system security, and providing technical support to maintain seamless operations. I am passionate about solving complex IT challenges and continuously improving system performance
- Network Administration (Cisco, Fortinet, Aruba)
- Virtualization & Cloud Management (Proxmox, VMware)
- System Monitoring & Troubleshooting (Zabbix, Graylog , Grafana)
- IT Infrastructure Deployment & Optimization
